description: Find companies in HubSpot by name or domain to enrich research and outreach. Get fast, accurate matches with canonical company details right in your workflow. Streamline prospecting and CRM hygiene with targeted search.

hubspotAccessToken.description: HubSpot Private App access token with crm.objects.companies.read scope

tools.name: search_companies
tools.description: Search for companies in HubSpot by name or domain

query.description: Company name or domain to search for. If the query contains a dot, it searches by domain; otherwise by name.
